EmailTemplate.name: VMworld Europe 2014 VIP Party.Maybe Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: We Hope You'll Join Us: VMTurbo VMworld Europe VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We hope we'll see you at the reception on Tuesday, 14 October after a lightspeed day at VMworld.
When your schedule is set, feel free to revisit the invitation page and confirm your registration <http://go.vmturbo.com/vmworld-europe-2014-VIP-cocktail-party-rsvp.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vipinvite>.
We'll send you a reminder a few days before.
This VMworld is going to be huge, as we introduce A New Hope for the Datacenter.
From the Rebellion Vanguard, Team Turbo
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
